scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rm -rf tmp && mkdir tmp
scripts.build:css:bundle: cp "src/css/spotlight.less" tmp/ && ./node_modules/less/bin/lessc --autoprefix=">=1%" --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --rebase" tmp/spotlight.less tmp/spotlight.css && csso tmp/spotlight.css --output tmp/spotlight.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && node task/bundle --image && npm run build:css:bundle && node task/bundle --style && node task/bundle --template && npm run build:js && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:extern && npm run copy && echo Build Complete. && exit 0
scripts.update: npm install base64-img@latest && npm install cpx@latest && npm install csso@latest && npm install csso-cli@latest && npm install google-closure-compiler@nightly && npm install less@latest && npm install less-plugin-autoprefix@latest && npm install less-plugin-clean-css@latest && npm install web-servo@latest
